casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Francis ANDERSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 1, 2019

Monte P. Radler, public defender, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Walker, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 569, 203 A.3d 683 (2019), is denied.
